summary: THE DRIVER SIDE SUN VISOR WILL NOT STAY IN THE "UP" OR STOWED POSITION  IT HANGS DOWN, ABOUT HALFWAY.  I REALLY BELIEVE THIS IS CLEARLY A SAFETY ISSUE BECAUSE IT HAS BLOCKED PART OF MY SIGHT.  TOYOTA DEALERSHIPS WANT OVER $200 TO FIX IT.  THEY REFUSE TO FIX IT FREE OF CHARGE UNLESS THERE HAVE BEEN MORE COMPLAINTS.  THIS IS ALSO NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OF THEIR WARRANTY PRODUCTS.   *TR
